title: Part-Time Virtual Assistant – Amazon Ads & Book Sales Specialist
job_overview:
Part-Time Virtual Assistant – Amazon Ads & Book Sales Specialist

 Start Date: ASAP
Are you experienced in Amazon Ads and passionate about helping books reach the right readers?
 We’re looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Virtual Assistant to support our client, who owns an organization focused on growth, learning, and transforming perspectives through written content.
Responsibilities:
Manage and optimize Amazon Ads (KDP/Amazon Advertising) for book listings
Monitor ad performance and adjust campaigns for cost-effective conversions
Assist in strategies to improve book discoverability and online sales
Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and track campaign performance
Update and maintain product listings (titles, descriptions, categories, etc.)
Qualifications:
Proven experience with Amazon Ads, especially in the books and publishing space
Experience in selling books online (Amazon KDP or self-published titles is a plus)
Familiar with ad metrics such as ACoS, CPC, impressions, and conversions
Bonus if experienced with other ad platforms like Meta Ads or Google Ads
Strong English communication skills
Organized, analytical, and detail-oriented
Commitment:
Part-Time to start, with potential to grow into more hours
Flexible schedule, but must be responsive during US business hours (CST preferred)
To Apply:
Please submit the following:
Your resume
A 60–90 second video introducing yourself and highlighting your experience with Amazon Ads and book sales
Any examples or data from past ad campaigns you've managed (optional but preferred)
